Articles.Content: Superior physics at long distances, mostly
I am excited for how bright and colorful the game is! It reminds me of the times I played KSP 1 as a kid.
I am super excited about the possibilities for new IVA's and first person playability (if it ever comes )
I'm most excited for interstellar travel and better graphics.

The only fact that this franchise is alive makes me excited. Everything else is insignificant.
GO KSP GO!

When all this "hype wave" will over I will be happy to see well-optimized game. 

In my opinion, for staying interesting for all category of players it should be somewhere between "hardcore astrophysics-realism" and "wide-understandable" from gameplay point of view.

 

Also I hope it will have somewhat more friquent and quality (from content POV) in compare to KSP 1, becouse budget is bigger, team is bigger, community is larger. Devs have a pretty good perspectives, so let's hope they will not ruin it.
I just can't wait to add more boosters and explore the system with my friends for science & fun!
In all seriousness, I'm rather intrigued by the SWERVE - I've always found the NERV not worth it.
I'm excited to be able to strand send my Kerbals in new solar systems!

Some content has been removed.

Please stay on topic, which is what you're excited for in the game.  This is not a complaint thread.  Remember, one entry per person!
I am looking forward to renewing my interest in KSP
I'm excited for the opportunity to expose my daughter to the game I love and to hopefully get a chance to see more of the system(s) than Kerbin's two moons!
Im excited for the new wave of players and support that will come in and help make KSP 2 as long lived and supported as KSP 1 was
I’m crippled with excitement for multiplayer. My friends will no longer be friends after we start a space race server.
Honestly, I'm really excited to dock up with other players in orbit.
Yeahhhh!!!!!
I'm so excited to visit Gurdamma and finally be able to go interstellar in the stock game!
I'm excited for my first Elcano challenge!
I'd be excited for a Mac version.
The bits I'm most excited about is the multiplayer and more importantly, the interstellar travel. Once it's added, it will be so exciting to be able to see other star systems in my game!
Here's hoping

I just hope I have as good a time as on the previous Kerbal. 

Well, I`m expecting too no bugs, no vesels exploding withyout reason, great graphics, no long time waiting for vesel load, colonies, interestelar... realy I hope a lot of new fun thing that let me spend long hours glues to my KSP

I hope it's not bad that I also already entered in the Discord.

I'm excited for the cold, unwelcoming vastness of space!
I'm excited to actually be able to use ion engines thanks to timewarp under acceleration.

I'm excited to see what kinds of monstrous contraptions I'll be able to put in orbit in KSP2!

Edited February 22, 2023 by Dominiquini
